desc: Our Every Cycle reusable tampon applicator replaces wasteful disposable applicators. Every Cycle tampons are made with a 100% certified organic cotton core and wrapped in a biodegradable wrapper. Every Cycle is committed to providing women with sustainable products related to and surrounding their periods.

layout.text: We are redefining our periods. Every Cycle at a time.
Our Every Cycle reusable tampon applicator replaces wasteful disposable applicators. Every Cycle tampons are made with a 100% certified organic cotton core and wrapped in a biodegradable wrapper.
